amendment.description: Amendment requires that the annual status reports to be made to Congress regarding the hydrogen research and development program include information on efforts made by the Department of Energy to ensure that the economic benefits of such research accrue to the U.S. economy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require that the annual status reports to be made to Congress regarding the hydrogen research and development program include information on efforts made by the Department of Energy to ensure that the economic benefits of such research accrue the U.S. economy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
